data.name: attachable
data.function: This unit can be attached to another friendly unit at deployment.

data.name: teleportation
data.function: This model's unit can perform the "Setup teleportation" action.

data.name: stealth
data.function: If this model's unit is near cover, it can only be selected as a target unit by units within 20 cm.

data.name: large_profile
data.function: This model cannot perform the "Brace" action.

data.name: fly
data.function: This model can perform the "Fly" action up to the given distance.

data.name: move
data.function: This model can perform the "Move" action up to the given distance.

data.name: score
data.function: This model's unit can perform the "Score objective" action.

data.name: ap
data.function: If the target model's armor characteristic is no more than 2 higher than this weapon's strength: The minimum damage infliced by each hit is 1.

data.name: heavy
data.function: Can only use this weapon when performing the "Heavy attack" action.

data.name: precise
data.function: Can select attached units as target unit.

data.name: separate
data.function: When attacking with another weapon without "separate": Can also attack with this weapon during the attack action.
